flawed_nl_solution:
A quarter of the balls are red and therefore there are 360 x (1 / 4) = <<360*(1/4)=90>>90 red balls.
When you remove the red balls from the ball pit there are 360 - 90 = <<360-90=265>>265 remaining balls
A fifth of the remaining balls are blue, and therefore there are 265 x (1 / 5) = <<265*(1/5)=53>>53 blue balls.
The total of red and blue balls equals 90 + 53 = <<90+53=143>>143 balls
When you remove the red and blue balls from the total there are 360 - 143 = <<360-143=217>>217 balls that are neither red nor blue.
#### 217

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 270, not 265. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
